# Turn your data into intelligence
Tydo’s Customer Intelligence Platform is a complete data warehouse built for AI powered customer insights. No engineer required.
[Get AI-powered insights](https://www.tydo.com/<https:/www.tydo.com/contact-sales?utm_source=tydo_site&utm_medium=home_page>)

## Meet Customer Intelligence
#### AI Data Infrastructure
Built to your specifications, we are creating your modern data stack built to leverage AI.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616ee61c8d1cb8e1963e418d/64671f830e4b6b6d42963aec_1.svg)
#### Insights Powered by AI
Examine millions of scenarios and be presented new customer segments for activation. Your AI does the searching.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616ee61c8d1cb8e1963e418d/64671f83dc8a736ef23e24c3_3.svg)
#### Fractional Data Science
We built the best software from providing the best service. We stay on as your fractional data scientists to help with all your reporting / data needs.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616ee61c8d1cb8e1963e418d/64671f823226cff6f8c776f9_2.svg)
## Quick & tailored setup
You have nothing to lose and an entire data intelligence strategy to gain.
[Get started](https://www.tydo.com/<https:/www.tydo.com/contact-sales?utm_source=tydo_site&utm_medium=home_page>)
# 1
## Introduction
We’ll learn about your business structure and goals.
# 2
## Demonstration
You will get a taste of what’s possible with Tydo.
# 3
## Scoping
We’ll align on what needs to be built.
# 4
## Onboarding
We will fully setup your platform and configuration.
## Intelligence Edge
These are just a few examples of how we're helping the whole team understand customer behavior.
Tydo for
### Founders
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616ee61c8d1cb8e1963e418d/64670d72e3e5c272f3ebbfd6_O3d.svg)
**Multi-sales channel view:** Custom reports of your business performance across Shopify, Amazon, retail, and more.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616ee61c8d1cb8e1963e418d/64670d72e3e5c272f3ebbfd6_O3d.svg)
**Grow profitably:** We can help you see the full financial picture so that you can make healthy, profit-first decisions.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616ee61c8d1cb8e1963e418d/64670d72e3e5c272f3ebbfd6_O3d.svg)
**Automating spreadsheets:** For when you’re ready to automate your spreadsheets.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616ee61c8d1cb8e1963e418d/64670d72e3e5c272f3ebbfd6_O3d.svg)
**Pacing + projections:** See how your actuals stack up against your projections so you can lead with clarity.
[Learn more about custom for brands](https://www.tydo.com/<https:/www.tydo.com/custom?utm_source=tydo_site&utm_medium=home_page>)
Tydo for
### Marketers
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616ee61c8d1cb8e1963e418d/64671915c813541f4769f2e0_Layer%201.svg)
**Custom attribution modeling:** Feel confident in where you spend your media dollars by leveraging a custom attribution report.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616ee61c8d1cb8e1963e418d/64671915c813541f4769f2e0_Layer%201.svg)
**Unconventional acquisition journeys:** For brands that want to understand what happens after someone takes a quiz, orders a free swatch, or receives a free gift with purchase and if those acquisition strategies are effective.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616ee61c8d1cb8e1963e418d/64671915c813541f4769f2e0_Layer%201.svg)
**Deep customer analysis:** Pull unique customer segments based on different traits and monitor their actions and behavior over time.
[Learn more about custom reporting for brands](https://www.tydo.com/<https:/www.tydo.com/custom?utm_source=tydo_site&utm_medium=home_page>)
Tydo for
### Operators
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616ee61c8d1cb8e1963e418d/64671b472cd92087f6e1db38_Square3d.svg)
**Sell-through reports:** Gain a better sense of what products sell-through so you can help direct your marketing and product priorities.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616ee61c8d1cb8e1963e418d/64671b472cd92087f6e1db38_Square3d.svg)
**Demand forecasting:** Make smarter inventory decisions by getting a better sense of your future deman.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616ee61c8d1cb8e1963e418d/64671b472cd92087f6e1db38_Square3d.svg)
**On-site merchandising insights:** Dive into product affinities so you can bundle products for higher conversions.
[Learn more about custom reporting for brands ](https://www.tydo.com/<https:/www.tydo.com/custom?utm_source=tydo_site&utm_medium=home_page>)
Tydo for
### Agencies
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616ee61c8d1cb8e1963e418d/64671c43250b6ab9a37e33c6_Check%203d%201.svg)
Weekly client reports: Your weekly client reports, automated. Focus on client communications. We’ve got the numbers covered.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616ee61c8d1cb8e1963e418d/64671c43250b6ab9a37e33c6_Check%203d%201.svg)
Offer a new service: Bring more value to your clients with data. Improve your client services by allowing us to serve as the backbone of your analytics offering.
[Learn more about custom reporting for agencies](https://www.tydo.com/</friends-of-tydo/agency-leads-to-watch>)

### Marketers
[Learn more about custom reporting for brands](https://www.tydo.com/<https:/www.tydo.com/high-growth-enterprise?utm_source=tydo_site&utm_medium=marketer_home_page>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616ee61c8d1cb8e1963e418d/64671915c813541f4769f2e0_Layer%201.svg)
**Channel performance overviews:** Feel confident in where your best customers come from and where your best money is spent.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616ee61c8d1cb8e1963e418d/64671915c813541f4769f2e0_Layer%201.svg)
**Data-backed personas:** Reveal the real-world attributes of your customer base and how they stack up to the US population. Create better growth and retention marketing by understanding attributes like Age, Income, Consumer Interests, and over 100 categories to inform strategy.

### Operators

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616ee61c8d1cb8e1963e418d/64671b472cd92087f6e1db38_Square3d.svg)
**Sell-through reports:** Gain a better sense of what products and collections sell-through so you can help direct your strategic priorities.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616ee61c8d1cb8e1963e418d/64671b472cd92087f6e1db38_Square3d.svg)

### Analytics
[Learn more about custom reporting for agencies](https://www.tydo.com/<https:/www.tydo.com/pricing?utm_source=tydo_site&utm_medium=agency_home_page>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616ee61c8d1cb8e1963e418d/64671c43250b6ab9a37e33c6_Check%203d%201.svg)
**A single vendor solution:** We cover the ETL and storage of your data. Bring your own BI tool, or use ours for free. Our app sits on your warehouse and will allow your team to self-serve questions while you focus on insights.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616ee61c8d1cb8e1963e418d/64671c43250b6ab9a37e33c6_Check%203d%201.svg)
**Enrich your data:** Bring more value to the team with 3rd party data. Improve your insights by leveraging an entire new set of customer attributes like Age, Income, Consumer Interests, and over 100 other categories.

generated_description:
**Tydo: Turning Data into Intelligence**

Founded in 2020 and part of Y Combinator's Summer 2020 batch, Tydo is on a mission to transform raw data into actionable intelligence. Based in Los Angeles, California, with a compact team of 14, the company has rapidly evolved its offering into a Customer Intelligence Platform—a data warehouse designed specifically for AI-powered customer insights. Notably, this platform can be utilized without the need for extensive engineering resources.

### What They Offer
At the heart of Tydo is the promise of simplicity: businesses can access meaningful customer insights effortlessly. With no engineers required, Tydo equips users with the tools to delve into customer behavior, optimize their marketing strategies, and ultimately enhance their e-commerce performance.

Their platform has caught the attention of various brands, some of which have reported significant improvements—like New Era, which managed to double its e-commerce revenue using Tydo's services.

### Core Features
1. **AI-Powered Insights**: Tydo uses advanced algorithms to analyze customer behavior across different channels, revealing new segments for engagement.
   
2. **Fractional Data Science**: Beyond software, Tydo positions itself as a partner, offering data scientists to assist with reporting and further analytical needs.

3. **Flexible Onboarding**: The onboarding process is tailored for each business, ensuring that Tydo's platform aligns perfectly with its operational needs and objectives.

### Target Markets
Tydo caters to a range of sectors, including fintech, SaaS, and e-commerce, making it versatile for brands seeking to leverage their data. Their customized reports cover performance across multiple channels—Shopify, Amazon, and more—enabling business leaders to make informed decisions.

### Pricing Structure
While Tydo's services start at $4,500 per month, they provide a tiered pricing model that includes various features such as custom data source development and substantial data science support, scaling with the needs of the clients.

### Conclusion
In a world awash with data, Tydo stands out by simplifying the way businesses harness that data, transforming it into intelligence without the complexity or cost of traditional data infrastructure. This makes it an appealing option for high-growth brands looking to enhance their understanding of consumer behavior and drive growth.

For more information about their offering or to explore how Tydo can enhance your business intelligence capabilities, visit their website: [Tydo](https://www.tydo.com).
